alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 12 at 3:44PM HST until January 13 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI...NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... .An extra-large northwest (330-340 degrees) swell will slowly diminish tonight, then shift to the north (350 degrees) tonight and Friday as it gradually eases. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 20 to 30 feet along north facing shores, and 15 to 20 feet along west facing shores of the smaller islands. Surf will gradually diminish tonight. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...High...Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful longshore and rip currents. Expect ocean water surging and sweeping across beaches, with localized beach erosion.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
